alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...GUST FRONT WILL IMPACT THE NORTH SHORE OF SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 930 PM EDT... At 836 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust from along a line extending from 7 miles east of Milford to near Port Jefferson to near Stony Brook. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stony Brook, Port Jefferson, Wading River, Northport, Mattituck, Rocky Point, Mount Sinai, Calverton, East Northport, Kings Park, Setauket, Greenlawn, Ridge, Miller Place and Fort Salonga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
